articles.title: U.S. Recognizes DPRK as Nuclear Weapons State
articles.content:
U.S. Recognizes DPRK as Nuclear Weapons State 
 Pyongyang, December 10 (KCNA) -- The U.S. government ranked the DPRK among nuclear weapons states.
					 The recent annual report of the U.S. Defense Department said "The rim of the great Asian Continent is already home to five nuclear powers: China, India, Pakistan, the DPRK and Russia".
					
					It is the first time that the U.S. officially recognized the DPRK as a nuclear weapons state and announced it in its government report.

articles.title: Greetings to Burkinese President
articles.content:
Greetings to Burkinese President
 Pyongyang, December 10 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Wednesday sent a message of greetings to Blaise Compaore, President of Burkina Faso, on the occasion of its 50th national day.
					Expressing the belief that the good friendly and cooperative relations between the DPRK and Burkina Faso would grow stronger in the future, Kim in his message sincerely wished the president bigger success in his noble work for the progress and prosperity of the country and the peace and security in the sub-region.

articles.title: Friendship Meeting Arranged by Palestinian Charge d'Affaires
articles.content:
Friendship Meeting Arranged by Palestinian Charge d'Affaires
Pyongyang, December 10 (KCNA) -- Riyad Shehadeh, charge d' affaires ai of the State of Palestine here, arranged a friendship meeting at his embassy on Wednesday on the occasions of the 17th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's assumption of supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army and the 91st birth anniversary of anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk.
					 Kim Hyong Jun, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, and officials concerned were present there on invitation.
					
					Speakers at the meeting spoke highly of the immortal exploits of Kim Jong Il and the noble revolutionary life of Kim Jong Suk.
					
					 The participants talked to one another about the need to boost the DPRK-Palestinian relations, deepening the friendship.

articles.title: New Books Off Press
articles.content:
New Books Off Press
 Pyongyang, December 10 (KCNA) -- New books have been published recently by the Literature and Art Publishing House of the DPRK.
					 The book "Bosom of Great Teacher," divided into six chapters, deals with the immortal exploits performed and noble virtues shown by General Secretary Kim Jong Il while guiding the Mansudae Art Troupe.
					
					The full-length novel "Song of Women" from the cycle of novels "On the Road of Loyalty" conveys the undying feats made by Anti-Japanese War Hero Kim Jong Suk who rallied the women of all walks of life close around President Kim Il Sung by wisely leading the Korean women's movement after the liberation of the country.
					
					 Besides, the publishing house brought out the collection of literary works "New Song of Jangja River" on the pride of the working class and people in Jagang Province and the full-length novel "The Summer and Winter of That Year" with the last Fatherland Liberation War as the background.

articles.title: Human Rights Condition Resulting from Quite Different Standards
articles.content:
Human Rights Condition Resulting from Quite Different Standards
Pyongyang, December 10 (KCNA) -- To establish a proper human rights standard is very important in fairly solving the human rights problem.
					This standard is dissimilar as countries differ in idea, ism, religion and system and in the level of economic and cultural development and target of social development.
					
					 In the DPRK, a man-centred socialist society, it is a fair standard of human rights, if the people like it and it suits their interests, and human rights are institutionalized on the political and legal basis.
					
					 All the members of the society enjoy an independent and creative life to their heart's content, fully guaranteed all the rights of a social being including political freedom and rights, the right to work and existence and the right to education and medical treatment.
					
					 On the contrary, the U.S.-led imperialists set forth human rights conception and standard for the exploiter classes as a "human rights pattern" under the cloak of deceptive "globalization" and are trying to force it upon all other countries. 
					
					 In the United States, which styles itself the "human rights defender" and the "human rights judge", a handful of wealthy clans enjoy privileges, holding most of the riches of the country in their hands.
					
					 According to official count, more than 36 million people went hungry and 47 million could not get proper medical aid when they fell ill, left out of "medical insurance" for the lack of money, in the U.S. last year alone. 
					
					More than 120,000 go begging without a roof over their heads and 8.5 million (as of May) were jobless across the country. Annually, nearly 2 million working people on an average are under threat of violence and over 1.8 million get injured at their working sites.
					
					 The U.S. tops the world in drug consumption where 42.2 percent of the population used mariguana and 16.2 percent cocaine more than once. It had nearly 2.32 million prisoners at the beginning of this year, the highest in ratio to the population, and records the biggest crimes in mistreating them. It made robber-like inroads into Iraq and burned defenseless inhabitants to death by using even chemical weapons. The U.S. is, indeed, the kingpin of human rights abuse.
					
					Nevertheless, the U.S. is kicking up quite a dust, croaking that "human rights are violated" in the socialist society and socialism is "inhuman society". It brings a hornet's nest about the world's ear by making public a "human rights report" every year and taking issue with the human rights records of other countries.
					
					 This situation resulting from the diametrically different human rights standards glaringly proves that the United States is the very one which should sit in the "dock" of the human rights court and the "human rights problem" over which it is letting out a terrific outcry is nothing but a political fiction for intensifying interference in others' internal affairs and intrigues to overthrow their governments and stifle them.

articles.title: U.S. Frantic Arms Buildup Assailed
articles.content:
U.S. Frantic Arms Buildup Assailed
Pyongyang, December 10 (KCNA) -- The U.S. Department of Defense is mulling the deployment of three squadrons of F-22 in the Asia-Pacific region. Global Hawk will reportedly be deployed in the U.S. Air Force base on Guam soon. 
					 Meanwhile, the American Enterprise Institute worked out a "written proposal" demanding closer U.S.-Japan alliance to be submitted to Congress.
					
					 Rodong Sinmun Wednesday observes in a signed commentary in this regard:
					
					 The aim sought by the U.S. in bolstering its aggressor forces and sharply increasing their military operation capability in the Asia-Pacific region is to hold a military edge there and carry out the strategy for a preemptive attack on the targets designed by it.
					
					The reality indicates that the U.S. scenario to realize its ambition for invading the DPRK and dominating Asia by making a shift to the strategy of task force from the strategy of using forces stationed in certain areas dating back to the period of the Cold War, mounting preemptive attacks by use of ultra-modern mobile strike means and strategic armed forces and waging an indiscriminate war has entered the phase of full-scale implementation.
					
					In order to implement its Asia-Pacific strategy for aggression, the U.S. seeks to bind countries in the region to its military alliance and knock into shape a new NATO type military bloc of Asian version and make the best use of it. To this end, the U.S. is stepping up the arms buildup in the Asia-Pacific region and hastening the formation of the military alliance with the countries in the region.
					
					 The DPRK is made the main target of its preemptive attack and herein lies the purpose of its military steps.
					
					 The U.S. bellicose forces are escalating their moves for preemptive attack on the DPRK behind the scene of the six-party talks, thus gravely threatening peace and stability in Northeast Asia including the Korean Peninsula and exacerbating the tension there. This is a reckless military action going against the trend of the present situation and little short of planting a time-bomb in the way of the six-party talks.
					
					 The U.S. warlike forces would be well advised to face up to the trend of the times and give up the military hysteria disturbing dialogue and peace.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Group Accused of Tampering with History
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Group Accused of Tampering with History
Pyongyang, December 10 (KCNA) -- The Lee Myung Bak group of traitors is letting ultra-right conservative maniacs give "special lectures on modern history" before students of hundreds of high schools in Seoul. This is an unprecedented charade.
					In those lectures the conservative elements are talking such sheer nonsense as the south Korean economy in the modern times "began to take shape" in the period of the colonial rule of Japan and "Japan's colonization of Korea was helpful to her modernization and civilization." They went the lengths of extolling to the sky traitors to the nation and former military dictators and justifying the split of the Korean nation by the United States. Rodong Sinmun Wednesday observes in a signed commentary in this regard:
					
					What the group uttered is not a mere distortion of history but total falsification of historical facts.
					
					Through such ruckus being staged by the group vis-a-vis students it seeks to infuse the idea of obedience and submission to foreign forces and the spirit of standing in confrontation with the DPRK into them in a bid to leave the south Korean society as a colony of foreign forces forever and keep Korea permanently divided so that compatriotism no longer exists in the minds of Koreans.
					
					This is an unpardonable criminal move to facilitate the process of turning the south Korean society ultra-right conservative and completely stamp out the movement for independence, democracy and reunification.
					
					The group is working hard to distort history in favor of serving the purpose of maintaining its traitorous regime, falsify truth and justify its acts of treachery but this is nothing but a day-dream.
					
					 The group will never be able to go scot-free as it is hell-bent on tampering even with history, not content with selling off the interests of the nation quite contrary to the trend of the times, warns the commentary.

articles.title: S. Korea-U.S. "Economic Aid Agreement" under Fire
articles.content:
S. Korea-U.S. "Economic Aid Agreement" under Fire
Pyongyang, December 10 (KCNA) -- Newspapers Wednesday carry by-lined articles 60 years since the United States and south Korea concluded a treacherous and shackling "economic aid agreement."
					Rodong Sinmun in an article terms the south Korea-U.S. "economic aid agreement" an aggressive and shackling one fabricated by the U.S. to completely hold sway over politics and economy in south Korea and convert it into a U.S. military base and theater of its economic plunder under the signboard of "aid" and, at the same time, a treacherous "agreement" as the Syngman Rhee clique sold off the interests of the nation to the U.S. lock, stock, and barrel in return for maintaining its treacherous regime.
					
					 The catastrophic situation created by the International Monetary Fund in which untold sufferings and disaster were imposed upon the south Koreans in the period of the "civilian" regime was a product of the structural weakness of south Korean economy shackled to the U.S. monopoly capital, the article observes, and goes on:
					
					 The U.S. domination and subjugation of south Korea have become evermore pronounced due to the sycophancy and acts of treachery of the Lee Myung Bak regime that emerged under the signboard of "pragmatism."
					
					The south Korea-U.S. FTA precisely means the south Korea-U.S. "economic aid agreement" of modern version.
					
					 FTA much advertised and pushed forward by the Lee group is nothing but an abyss of subjugation and ruin as it is aimed at driving the south Korean economy to bankruptcy. It is as clear as noonday that the treacherous regime's desperate efforts to conclude FTA, talking about the so-called "state interests," are bound to render the weak economy of south Korea bankrupt and seriously threaten the people's right to existence.
					
					 These hard historical facts go to prove that south Korea can neither be free from the foreign political, economic and military domination and subjugation nor can south Koreans get rid of misery and sufferings as long as the U.S. policy of occupation and domination over south Korea is allowed to persist and traitors hell-bent on sycophancy toward the U.S. are permitted to stay in power.
					
					 Minju Joson in an article notes that the six decades since the conclusion of the above-said agreement only witnessed the U.S.'s intensified plunder of the south Korean economy.

articles.title: Struggle of Unionists Launched in S. Korea
articles.content:
Struggle of Unionists Launched in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, December 10 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Confederation of Trade Unions launched the struggle in Seoul on December 6, protesting against traitor Lee Myung Bak's unpopular misrule and crackdown upon the labor movement.
					A press conference was called in Youido to condemn the suppression of the chairman of the confederation.
					
					Speakers at the press conference referred to the fact that the police arrested the chairman on December 5 on charges that he led the actions against American beef import.
					
					 They denounced this arrest as politically-motivated crackdown upon the labor movement.
					
					The dictatorial regime forsaken by the people is instigating the security authorities to violate the popular masses' rights, they pointed out, declaring that the confederation would wage the struggle to punish the present "government" on a full scale.
					
					 Then, there was a "meeting to vow an all-out struggle for checking the retrogressive revision of the law on part-time jobs and the law on the lowest wage" with over 2,000 unionists affiliated to the confederation attending.
					
					 At the meeting, speakers charged that the recent moves of the "government" and the "Grand National Party" to retrogressively revise the said laws are aimed to inflict sufferings only upon the workers and other common people again under the pretext of the economic crisis.
					
					 After the meeting, its participants staged a protest struggle in demand of the release of the confederation chairman.
					
					 Meanwhile, Chief Vice-Chairperson Jin Yong Ok and other leading members of the confederation staged a sit-in strike in tents outside the "National Assembly" building.

articles.title: People's Meeting Vows to Judge Lee Myung Bak Regime
articles.content:
People's Meeting Vows to Judge Lee Myung Bak Regime
 Pyongyang, December 10 (KCNA) -- A "national meeting for judging Lee Myung Bak regime for rendering economy bankrupt and violating democracy" took place in Seoul on Dec. 6 under the co-sponsorship of the south Korean People's Council for Public Welfare and Democracy and the Emergency People's Action for Defending Democracy and Checking Suppression of Candlelight Struggle.
					 Speakers at the meeting deplored that the south Korean society has been thrown into a general crisis in less than ten months of Lee Myung Bak's office.
					
					 They charged that the Lee regime's "policy of killing the common people" has rendered the economy bankrupt and brought the people's living to the worst situation and its policy of confrontation with compatriots inciting a Cold War pushed the inter-Korean relations to collapse and put peace at peril.
					
					 They demanded the regime drop its policy of reducing the taxes of the big businesses only, stop the moves for the retrogressive revision of "the law on broadcasting services" and the like and all members of the present cabinet, the arch criminal responsible for economic bankruptcy, step down.
					
					Meanwhile, youth organizations including the Youth and Students Solidarity for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration, the south Korean Council of Youth Organizations and the Youth Committee of the Democratic Labor Party which participated in the meeting held an inaugural ceremony of the preparatory committee of the Youth Council for Public Welfare and Democracy on the same day and expressed the will to wage a struggle for judging the Lee regime for its treacherous and anti-reunification acts.

articles.title: Day of Sun and February Holiday to Be Commemorated in Czech Republic
articles.content:
Day of Sun and February Holiday to Be Commemorated in Czech Republic
Pyongyang, December 10 (KCNA) -- The Czech preparatory committee to commemorate the Day of the Sun and February 16 in 2009 was inaugurated with due ceremony in Prague on December 4.
					Jaroslav Kafka, chairman of the Paektusan Czech-Korean Friendship Association and chairman of the Czech Group for the Study and Materialization of the Juche Idea, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee at the ceremony.
					
					The preparatory committee decided to organize meetings, round-table talks, lectures and film shows in various counties of the Czech Republic, issue special bulletins and adopt a letter to General Secretary Kim Jong Il on the occasions of the Day of the Sun and February 16 in 2009.

articles.title: EE.UU. reconoce a la RPDC como poseedor de arma nuclear
articles.content:
EE.UU. reconoce a la RPDC como poseedor de arma nuclear
Pyongyang, 10 de diciembre (ATCC) -- El gobierno de Estados Unidos publico un informe reconociendo que la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea es un pais poseedor de arma nuclear.
					El informe anual del Departamento de Defensa de EE.UU., publicado recientemente, senalo que ya existen en el continente asiatico 5 poseedores de arma nuclear y los cito en el orden de China, la India, Pakistan, Corea y Rusia.
					
					Esta es la primera vez que EE.UU. reconociera oficialmente a la RPDC como portador de arma nuclear y lo anunciara a traves de un informe gubernamental.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun denuncia aumento armamentista de EE.UU.
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun denuncia aumento armamentista de EE.UU.
Pyongyang, 10 de diciembre (ATCC) -- El diario Rodong Sinmun difundio en su edicion de este miercoles un comentario individual cuyo texto resumido sigue abajo:
					El Departamento de Defensa norteamericano planea emplazar en la region de Asia-Pacifico 3 batallones de cazas ultramodernos "F-22" con funciones de Stealth.
					
					Por otra parte, sera ubicado pronto en la base aerea norteamericana en la isla Guam el avion no tripulado de exploracion a grandes alturas "Global Hawk".
					
					Entretanto, el "Instituto Americano Empresarial" elaboro una "nota de proposicion" solicitando al Congreso Norteamericano el fortalecimiento de la alianza EE.UU.-Japon.
					
					El aumento de las fuerzas armadas agresoras en la region de Asia-Pacifico y el fortalecimiento brusco de la capacidad de operacion militar por parte de EE.UU. persiguen el objetivo de tomar la heguemonia militar en esta region para realizar la estrategia de ataque preventivo contra los blancos deseados.
					
					La realidad demuestra que esta en la etapa crucial de materializacion el intento de EE.UU. de cambiar su estrategia de mantener a sus tropas en una zona fija, usada en el periodo de la Guerra Fria, por la de unidades moviles, y de agredir a Corea y dominar a Asia valiendose del ataque preventivo y la guerra indiscriminada, basados en los sofisticados medios moviles de ataque y las fuerzas armadas estrategicas.
					
					Para la ejecucion de su estrategia agresiva de Asia-Pacifico, EE.UU. intenta atar a los paises regionales al marco de la alianza militar y utilizarlos luego de organizar un bloque militar asiatico al estilo de la OTAN.
					
					En ese sentido, el imperio aumenta ahi sus fuerzas armadas y acelera el establecimiento de la alianza militar con los paises regionales.
					
					La RPDC es el blanco principal del eventual ataque preventivo de EE.UU. y el objetivo de dichas medidas militares.
					
					Detras de la cortina de las conversaciones seis-partitas, las fuerzas belicosas de EE.UU. recrudecen las maniobras de ataque preventivo contra la RPDC amenazando gravemente la paz y la estabilidad y exacerbando la tension en la Peninsula Coreana y otras partes del Nordeste Asiatico. Esto es una locura militar desafiante al curso de la situacion actual e igual a poner una bomba de tiempo en el proceso de la cita a 6 bandas.
					
					Ellas deben ver correctamente la corriente de la epoca y poner de inmediato fin a sus locuras militares oponentes al dialogo y a la paz.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun rechaza invencion de historia por Lee Myung Bak
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun rechaza invencion de historia por Lee Myung Bak
Pyongyang, 10 de diciembre (ATCC) -- En estos dias, siguiendo las instrucciones de la banda traidora de Lee Myung Bak del Sur de Corea, los conservadores ultraderechistas estan impartiendo la llamada "leccion especial de la historia contemporanea" a los alumnos de cientos de escuelas superiores en la metropoli de Seul.
					En esta payasada sin precedente la horda de conservadores enumera una serie de sofisterias como que la economia moderna surcoreana empezo a "formarse" bajo la dominacion colonial de Japon y que el "colonialismo japones contribuyo a la modernizacion y civilizacion de Corea". Ademas, ellos encomiaron sobremanera a los traidores vendepatrias y a los anteriores dictadores militares y justificaron la division nacional impuesta por Estados Unidos.
					
					En un comentario individual divulgado este miercoles, el diario Rodong Sinmun denuncio categoricamente esa maniobra de la horda de Lee calificandola de invencion total de la historia mas alla de la tergiversacion.
					
					Detras de la ensenanza de esa historia inventada a los alumnos esta la siniestra intencion de los pandilleros de Lee de inyectar en las generaciones venideras de la conciencia de sumision y obediencia a las fuerzas extranjeras y el sentimiento conflictivo con la RPDC, de tal modo que la sociedad surcoreana fuera la colonia de las fuerzas foraneas de generacion en generacion y un mundo dividido definitivamente que no se confraterniza con los connacionales del Norte, revela el comentarista.
					
					Prosigue que este imperdonable acto criminal se encamina a acelerar la transformacion de la sociedad surcoreana segun el conservadurismo ultraderechista y a aplastar totalmente el movimiento por la independencia, la democracia y la reunificacion.
					
					Es una ambicion nunca realizable el intento de la horda de Lee de tergiversar la verdad y justificar sus actos vendepatrias enmendando la historia a favor del mantenimiento de su "poder" traidor, califica.
					
					Advierte que no podra salir ilesa esa horda que insulta hasta la historia como si no bastaran sus actos traidores a la nacion coreana cometidos desafiando a la corriente de la epoca.

articles.title: Periodicos condenan convenio economico EE.UU.-Sur de Corea
articles.content:
Periodicos condenan convenio economico EE.UU.-Sur de Corea
Pyongyang, 10 de diciembre (ATCC) -- Los periodicos capitalinos publicaron este miercoles articulos individuales con motivo del 60o aniversario de la firma del leonino "convenio de ayuda economica" entre Estados Unidos y el Sur de Corea.
					El diario Rodong Sinmun precisa que ese "convenio" tiene el caracter agresivo porque a traves de este documento, EE.UU. persiguio bajo el falso rotulo de "ayuda" el establecimiento total del dominio politico y economico sobre el Sur de Corea y la conversion de este territorio en su base militar y campo de explotacion economica, y continua:
					
					A su vez, en virtud de ese convenio, la camarilla de Syngman Rhee vendio en bandeja a EE.UU los intereses nacionales a cambio de la garantia del mantenimiento de su traidor "regimen".
					
					En el periodo del "poder civil" fue desatado el incidente catastrofico del "Fondo Monetario Internacional" que hizo sufrir al pueblo surcoreano indecibles desgracias y calamidades.
					
					Esto fue un producto de la vulnerabilidad estructural de la economia surcoreana totalmente dependiente del capital monopolista de EE.UU.
					
					La dominacion y la subyugacion de EE.UU. sobre el Sur de Corea van de mal en peor por los actos traidores del "poder" de Lee Myung Bak que tomo la posesion bajo el cartel de "pragmatismo".
					
					Se puede decir que el "tratado de libre comercio" entre el Sur de Corea y EE.UU. es la version contemporanea del "convenio de ayuda economica".
					
					Resulta evidente que el "TLC", que trata de suscribir a toda costa el "poder" del traidor Lee hablando pomposamente de los supuestos "intereses nacionales", llevara a la bancarrota la ya bastante vulnerable economia surcoreana y amenazara seriamente el derecho a la vida del pueblo.
					
					Los hechos historicos demuestran que mientras sigue vigente la politica de ocupacion y dominio de EE.UU. sobre el Sur de Corea y se mantiene el poder de los traidores proyanquis, el Sur de Corea no puede liberarse jamas del yugo politico, economico y militar de las fuerzas extranjeras y los habitantes surcoreanos seguiran sufriendo desgracias y penas.
					
					De otro lado, el periodico Minju Joson revela que la historia de 60 anos del "convenio de ayuda economica" fueron los anales en que se profundizo el saqueo de EE.UU. sobre la economia surcoreana.
